forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 20C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 68F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A clear sky. Low 6C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 42F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High around 25C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 77F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 47F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 28C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 82F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 9C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 49F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 26C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 79F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low near 10C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 51F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 29C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 84F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 21C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 70F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low near 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 51F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 23C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 73F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low near 10C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low around 50F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 21C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 69F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High around 20C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 68F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 48F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 20C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 69F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered thunderstorms in the evening, mainly cloudy late with a few showers. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms during the evening followed by a few showers overnight. Low 48F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
